name: Cowboys & Coldboys
description:
A game I made entirely by myself for the Paint Jam 2020!

Please enable fullscreen so that the HUD works properly.

Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys: Walk

Ctrl / Left Click: Shoot

Your bullets reload with time.

If the Camera glitches out after you die, you can refresh the page, that's my mistake.

If you ever get stuck and can't walk to a specific direction, walk a little bit to the opposite direction, that's just a barrier bodge I ended up doing that may cause problems.

My game doesn't fit the theme at all, I just wanted an excuse to make a game in paint, sorry  about that.
